question: A chef needs to cook 9 potatoes. He has already cooked 7. If each potato takes 3 minutes to cook, how long will it take him to cook the rest?
response:
The chef has already cooked 7 potatoes, which means he has 9 - 7 = 2 potatoes left to cook.
Each potato takes 3 minutes to cook, so the total time to cook the remaining 2 potatoes is 2 potatoes x 3 minutes per potato = 6 minutes.
The answer is 6 minutes.
